title: It‚Äôs not perfect but I still like it!
text: I adore this game, it‚Äôs a classic match 3 with satisfying sounds, combos, and effects. The music is wonderful too! Whimsical and playful and dynamic. That said, my only complain is that it takes so long for lives to replenish and free ‚Äúkeep playing‚Äù spins to roll over. 48 hours between ‚Äúkeep playing‚Äù spins, yet you are encouraged to log in daily. 20 minutes for a single life when you only get 5 to begin with. It‚Äôs also easy to get on a roll and start picking up a bunch of power ups and whatnot which feels good but then when you hit a level that‚Äôs incredibly difficult, you lose it all. It‚Äôs more than a little disheartening.

title: Very upset!!

title: Cannot log in!

Every time I log in it says ‚Äúthere was a connection error. Try again in a bit.‚Äù
I have tried with WiFi, without, different zip codes. I‚Äôm so bummed.

title: Candy crush stole my boosters and refused to replaced them.
text: I‚Äôve been playing candy crush for years. I‚Äôve collected various boosters through daily boosters and challenges. I‚Äôve recently upgraded my cellphone. I had a screen shot of all the boosters I‚Äôve collected. Candy crush refused to replace my boosters. I would stay far away from this game. They can careless about the players. I‚Äôll never play again.

title: Dishonest app
text: I‚Äôve been dealing with this dishonest app for years I‚Äôm up in the 5600 levels. They have a competition every week to see who beats the most levels.  Repeatedly I‚Äôve seen so much discrepancies.   For example I was 8 levels ahead of the next person.  I played a level took me twice to win came  back and that person was 6 ahead of me. Impossible totally not enough time.  Then earlier this morning I was 40 levels ahead come  back later today  that person is 9 ahead. Once again impossible I always check to see what level the person below me is so when I check later it better agree with the number of levels that person was suppose to beat well surprise surprise today the level people are at says everyone‚Äôs at level 1 but me.  So can‚Äôt prove anything. I believe there‚Äôs no real person there the icon of the person under me says player no name    This is just one of so many things they do to rig this app to get u to buy booster

title: What happened? Bug?
text:
Hi, I‚Äôm hoping for a response, couldn‚Äôt find any where else to post my issue. I‚Äôm on level 4350, so I‚Äôve been playing awhile. A couple weeks ago, I was no longer playing with my friends, just some weird made up players. Therefore, I wasn‚Äôt receiving any lives. It‚Äôs still showing my name/my pic/my account. Like I‚Äôve done in the past I deleted and rejoined. My friends are back, I‚Äôm on the correct level etc., but, I lost over 700 lives, 175 of the pink licorice wheels and a bunch of my other bonuses. Can you please look into this and give them back? Thanks!
Love to hate this game! üòú

title: Level#241 ..& had to DELETE the GAME!
text: I notice your ratings are dropping for this ONCE super awesome game! After playing for years, when it first debuted, I came back. But now, once you reach a certain higher-level and do Races and Contests, it is virtually IMPOSSIBLE to continue the fun of playing because you get stuck and the power-ups you‚Äôve earned NEVER show up to use them!!!‚Äô Number one suggestion..GIVE MORE‚ù§Ô∏èLIFES, fix the BUGS, and keep it FUN!!!!!!

title: Having fun,but...
text: I love Candy Crush-but,why is it so hard just to earn rewards? Instead of having to buy them. I understand you want to make some money too-but we shouldn‚Äôt have to buy that many and then have to buy the gold bars too. Whatever happened to just having fun? You know others are going to spend money on your other games-but for those of us just starting out..it gets to be too much.

title: Sudden problem
text:
I‚Äôve played this game for several years and enjoyed it. Every time I hit one that I enjoy I may do it over and over. Imagine my surprise when I pushed the number for one of my faves and a totally different number appears! When it happened to another fave the same way a day or so later. So I deleted the app and will try another one soon.
Later: I downloaded a new copy of the app and it‚Äôs doing the same thing! 37 goes to 26, 1 goes to 20, etc. let me know when it‚Äôs fixed!
Reloaded a new app and now it‚Äôs doing the same thing (4/30/19). Very annoying as of course I‚Äôll have to start at One and work up. Please fix!!!

Months later: I had to reload the app because it was frozen. However, the new copy makes me start over at the beginning rather than taking me to where I left off! I‚Äôll find something else for a while.
